alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 1:16PM MST until July 27 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE MUSEUM FIRE SCAR AREA BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 114 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Museum Fire scar area. Rain gauges indicated over an inch of rain fell over the scar and light flow has been reported at Linda Vista Drive. Additional heavy rain is possible in the next 30 minutes. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Museum Fire scar area. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Museum Fire scar area. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Flagstaff. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Schultz Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Museum Fire scar area. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
